author: hollowstrawberry
description: Plays text to speech in voice chat. Overrides music.
install_msg:
ðŸ—£ __**TTS**__ ```Cog installed. Instructions:
1. Load it with [p]load tts
2. Make sure the Audio cog is also enabled.
3a. Optionally, enable the slash command with [p]slash enable tts
  3b. Sync slash commands with [p]slash sync
  3c. You may need to restart Discord to see the new command.```
short: Plays text to speech in voice chat. Overrides music.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store user data.
